website_summaries.verdict: The Seek Thermal is a simple, inexpensive plug-in thermal-imaging camera useful for plumbers, electricians, and anyone who wants to be handy around the house, with versions for both iOS and Android devices.
cons: Images captured are raw thermal data and low in detail
Android version requires an adapter for LG-manufactured devices

customer_reviews.title: More than surprised
customer_reviews.text: So to justify me buying this, you can see people's temperature from a distance.... I know it's a poor excuse, but whatever. I was more than surprised with the quality and capabilities of this little unit. Out in the park at midnight, and could pick up a fox across two football pitches. Amazing. The only con is my main phone it is a little loose and the camera sometimes switches off, but in an old phone it's perfect. I can literally walk through the park in complete darkness.
customer_reviews.author: Rod conlon

customer_reviews.title: Struggled to really justify but a fine toy. A great Christmas present to a big kid.
customer_reviews.text: A cool (pardon the pun) boys toy. I'm glad I've previously had struggles with my phone relating to the connection on a one plus 5t, consequently I understood that I'd need to allow it to connect via settings which the manufacturer wouldn't have been able to help me with. The resolution is alright but not fantastic (the reason only 4 stars). Have had some good images but to get something more satisfying I've used Mirror Lab image manipulation to give a more worthwhile image. Expensive just for a bit of fun but it may be really useful one day.
customer_reviews.author: Dank

customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent, not cheap, small compact compared to a hand held FLIR's but particularly useful for use in electronic fault finding by identifying over heating components in circuit boards. Can be useful in other areas such as identifying energy heat loss around the house.

customer_reviews.title: Frequent Crashes
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the Seek Thermal Compact XR (Android version). Frequent screen freezes which could only be resolved by unplugging and reconnecting the camera, only for it to happen again after 20-30 seconds of use. I don't know if the problem is with the app or the camera itself (or my Moto G6 Play phone) but it was very disappointing for me. On the other hand the Amazon return procedure via UPS was absolutely brilliant and I had my refund within 24 hours so five stars for that!
customer_reviews.author: UrLord

product_meta.title: Seek Thermal Compact Thermal Imaging Camera for Apple iPhone iOS Phones
product_meta.description:
Size Name:iOS| Style Name:Compact

Seek Thermal is the most advanced thermal imaging camera for your Smartphone. The Seek camera allows you to literally see heat, making it possible to spot heat sources in daylight, total darkness, or in obscured visibility conditions. This true thermal imaging camera uses the data from over 32,000 thermal pixels to create a visible image on your Smartphone.

With its wide field of view, the original Seek Thermal camera is perfect for use indoors and around the house.

This camera is great for:



 * Contractors to see water damage, air leaks, missing insulation, and other energy inefficiencies.
 * Home owners and DIYers to conduct a home energy audit to help save on their energy bill.
 * Plumbers to detect water leaks and clogs.
 * Electricians to identify electrical shorts, loose wiring, and other safety hazards.
 * Pet owners to locate lost pets at night or in obscured visibility conditions.



Seek Thermal Specification:



 * 36 Degree Field of View
 * Fixed Focus
 * Resolution: 206 x 156 Array
 *  -40C to 330C Detection
 *  9 Hz
 * Long Wave Infrared 7.2 - 13 Microns
 * 12 micron Pixel Pitch
 * Vanadium Oxide Microbolometer
 * Chalcogenide Lens
 * Magnesium Housing
 * Protective Waterproof Case
 * Requires iOS 7.0
 * Download the Seek Thermal App from the App Store
 * App and online user guide is available in English, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, French, Dutch, German





BOX CONTAINS


 * 1 x Seek Thermal camera with lightning connector
 * 1 x Waterproof case
feature_bullets: Portable: This highly-portable thermal imaging camera features a large, 206 x 156 thermal sensor and a wide 36 Degree field of view, ideal for use indoors and around the house to detect anything from pipes to electrical faults
Visibility: Never worry what situation you are in the Compact thermal camera works in total darkness, broad daylight, and even obscured visibility conditions
Temperature Range: Best in class temperature Range, over 32,000 individual thermal pixels measures temperatures from -40 to 626 Degree Fahrenheit (-40 to 330 degree Celsius)

Work Smarter: Be more efficient by utilising the power of your Apple Phone, the free Seek Thermal app allows you to record images and videos directly to your smartphone and share findings of your home inspections for easy documentation
Quick Identification: The Compact camera features a focusable Lens for quick identification, aim and focus from 6 Inch to 1000 ft (300 m) for the sharpest images

Accurate Inspections: Professionals can conduct quick and accurate inspections to detect energy loss caused by air leaks, missing or damaged insulation, inefficient HVAC systems, electrical faults, and much more
Waterproof Case: The Compact Thermal Camera comes with its own waterproof carrying case to withstand the elements, 1 year manufacturer's warranty is also included with this Camera
